meanings.sent1: The miners piled up the mullocks outside the mine.
meanings.sent2: The trucks carried away the mullocks from the mining site.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the mullocks were treasures from a lost city.
meanings.sent4: The mullocks of discarded dreams filled the abandoned quarry.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the mullocks lingered in the air, a reminder of hard work.

meanings.sent1: Don't listen to him; he's just talking mullocks.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed his excuses as mere mullocks.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes were full of playful mullocks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered attic of mullocks and forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The politician's speech was a river of mullocks, flowing endlessly.
